name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. George CHRISTOPHER, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, and MANDERINO, JJ.
JONES, former C. J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. George CHRISTOPHER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
Judgments of sentence affirmed.
JONES, former C. J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: H. David Rothman, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Linda L. Kelly, Louis R. Paulick, Asst. Dist. Attys., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
373 A.2d 458
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. George CHRISTOPHER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted March 12, 1976.
Decided June 3, 1977.
H. David Rothman, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Linda L. Kelly, Louis R. Paulick, Asst. Dist. Attys., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, and MANDERINO, JJ.
